00020 /*! \file SMDFileData.h This file provides methods for reading a SMD file.
00021  */
00022 
00023 #ifndef _SMDFILEDATA_H_
00024 #define _SMDFILEDATA_H_

00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <vector>

00033 
00034 namespace affxsmd
00035 {
00036 /*! This class contains the frame information for each frame */
00037 class SMDFrame
00038 {
00039 public:
00040         /*! Constructor */
00041         SMDFrame();
00042 
00043         /*! Frame index. */
00044         int frameIdx;
00045         /*! Number of cell rows in the frame. */
00046         int     rows;
00047         /*! Number of cell columsn in the frame. */
00048         int     cols;
00049         /*! Cell row index of the start of the frame. */
00050         int     startRow;
00051         /*! Cell column index of the start of the frame. */
00052         int     startCol;
00053 };
00054 
00055 /*! This class reads a SMD file. */
00056 class SMDFileData
00057 {
00058 public:
00059         /*! Constructor */
00060         SMDFileData();
00061         /*! Destructor */
00062         virtual ~SMDFileData();
00063 
00064         /*! Sets the file name.
00065          * @param name The full path to the SMD file.
00066          */
00067         void SetFileName (const char *name) { filename = name; }
00068 
00069         /*! Gets the file name.
00070          * @return The full path to the SMD file.
00071          */
00072         const std::string GetFileName() const { return filename; }
00073 
00074         /*! Checks for the existance of the file passed to SetFileName.
00075          * @return True if the file exists.
00076          */
00077         bool Exists();
00078 
00079         /*! Read the SMD file.
00080          *      @return Returns true if the file was successfully read.
00081          */
00082         bool Read();
00083 
00084         /*! Get the SMDFrame information for a frame.
00085          *      @param frameIdx The frame index.
00086          *      @return A SMDFrame with information of the frame indicated by the frameIdx parameter.
00087          */
00088         SMDFrame GetFrame(unsigned int frameIdx);
00089 
00090         /*! Get the number of frames in the SMD.
00091          *      @return Number of frames.
00092          */
00093         unsigned int NumFrames() { return (unsigned int)smdFrames.size(); };
00094 
00095         /*! The number of frames rows in the SMD (frames per column) */
00096         unsigned int frameRows;
00097         /*! The number of frame columns in the SMD (frames per row) */
00098         unsigned int frameCols;
00099 
00100 protected:
00101         /*! Read the SMD data.
00102          *      @return Returns true if the SMD data was successfully read.
00103          */
00104         bool ReadData();
00105 
00106         /*! Clear all members except filename */
00107         void Clear();
00108 
00109         /*! Find a Record in a collection.
00110          *      @param records A collection of Records.
00111          *      @param section The section name of the Record to find.
00112          *      @param key The key name of the Record to find.
00113          *      @return A Record that matches the criteria, otherwise 0.
00114          */
00115         CIniFile::Record* FindRecord(std::vector<CIniFile::Record>& records, std::string section, std::string key);
00116 
00117         /*! Get the integer value of a key.
00118          *      @param records A collection of Records.
00119          *      @param section The section name of the value.
00120          *      @param key The key name of the value.
00121          *      @param value The value found.
00122          *      @return Returns true if the value was found in the collection.
00123          */
00124         bool GetIntValue(std::vector<CIniFile::Record>& records, std::string section, std::string key, int& value);
00125 
00126         /*! A flag indicating if a SMD has been read. */
00127         bool isRead;
00128         /*! SMD file name.  Including the relation or full path. */
00129         std::string filename;
00130         /*! A collection of SMDFrame information for all frames in the SMD. */
00131         std::vector<SMDFrame> smdFrames;
00132 };
